definitions.definition: Moral badness; wickedness; malevolence; the forces or behaviors that are the opposite or enemy of good.
definitions.example: Evil lacks spirituality, hence its need for mind control.

definitions.definition: Something which impairs the happiness of a being or deprives a being of any good; something which causes suffering of any kind to sentient beings; harm; injury; mischief.
A malady or disease; especially in the phrase king's evil (scrofula).
